title: Parent evaluates city's childcare infrastructure crisis
description: Parent evaluates city's childcare infrastructure crisis
content:
Scenario: Parent evaluates city's childcare infrastructure crisis
    Given the parent struggles to find affordable childcare
    And municipal zoning rules restrict home-based childcare
    When the parent reviews Observer's childcare access analysis
    Then they see municipality has 1 childcare slot per 4 children
    And understand zoning restrictions reduce supply
    And learn neighboring cities changed zoning to expand access
    And discover other parents facing same childcare crisis
    And parent advocacy targets municipal policy barriers
